title: What are some hype and intense rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lil Durk - Gas and mud This song is hype because he sounds like he’s too high off of lean and other drugs lol. The flow is catchy and the beat hits hard when you got the bass boosted.  Bonecrusher - Never Scared This is a hella hype and intense rap.  Chief Keef - Monster The beat is hard-hitting.  SD - She want me  Tu Pac - Ride on our enemies

Groupies by Future. Yosemite by Travis Scott (unfortunately, I can’t support his music anymore but this song is “hype and intense”) Diamonds Dancing Drake & Future Scholarships by Drake & Future Roman’s Revenge by Nicki Minaj Digits by Young Thug
